yatathwijitha palanaya yatathe eekiya rajyayak lesa awadharanaya kala solbari wyawasthawa 1947 di, pa්ragnyaptha karana ladi. 1948 bi්ratha්ranya adhirajyawadihu sinhala kompa්redaru panthiyata balaya pawara lankawen pitathwa giyaha.

nirushi wimalawira saha wayiman hettiaarachchirate anagatha parapura wenuwen jathika samagiya godanagimata janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kriya kara athayi basnahira palath aandu paksha pradhana sanwidhayaka renuka perera mahatha prakasha karayi.baththaramulla pihiti basnahira palath sabha nawa godanagille pasugiyada (08) pawathi raswimedi renuka perera mahatha me bawa prakasha keleya.mehidi basnahira palath sabhawa wenuwen wiganana warthawa idiripath wu athara, ehidi ejapa manthri ee. em. yusuf, wipaksha nayaka manju shri arangala yana mahathwaru kathakalaha.manthriwarun sidukarana wishesha prakashayan pilibandawa awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu bawath, homagama wiwidha sewa samupakara samithiya pilibandawa thama nangu prashnayata methek sabhawe awadhanaya yomukota nathi bawath, wipaksha nayaka manju shri arangala mahatha chodana keleya.rehenasiri waragoda mahatha (e. ja. ni. sa) - katunayaka adhiwegi marga idikirima gana janadhipathithumatath, basil rajapaksha mahathatath ape sthuthiya pirinamanawa.

“96 indala krida wilashaye wenasakata ida dunna, namuth adahas wala wenaswimata idak thibbe naha, 99 indala ee de wuna, jyeshta kridakayek waradiyi kiyala kandayam raswime kathakarana ayithiya 99 indala dunna kisima danduwamak nathuwa, kandayamen iwath karanne nathuwa, eken ape krikat kridawe unanthiya sigrayen diyunu wuna, mokada 96 loka kusalanaya dinnata 99di api palamu watayenma iwathwuna, namuth eda indala ada wenakam dakkoth api wisheshithawu loka kusalana wisheshitha tharagawala sahena diyunuwak labala thiyenawa” ohu thawaduratath pahadili kaleya.
